thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel near airport
thread.title_full: Nice hotel near airport - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: ibrake4java
title: Nice hotel near airport
text:
I was at this hotel for a conference and had a very enjoyable stay. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. There was a refrigerator, iron, and a safe in the room.
They had a complimentary shuttle to the airport, which I used every day to catch BART and head into the city.
